snippet.title: YOU - TRAILER - OUT ON NOV 8TH
snippet.description:
OUT ON NOV 8TH IN https://nugra.itch.io/

FOLLOW MY X FOR MORE INFO https://x.com/Paquitanavidad
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I NEED TO TALK TO GOD

After the sun murdered the moon, and her corpse flooded all the earth, YOU wants to talk to god to ask him one single question. You can transform into a gold statue, this form will help you advance your drowned world and find yourself in it.

Find the god of the sun before he finds you.

YOU is an abstract psychological-horror with driven narrative with puzzles aspects to it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

YOU features flashing images, light gore, explicit lenguage, as well as themes of abuse and suicide. The play session is around 45-60 minutes.
